summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Broadway and North Broadway from East Fir Street to East Roy Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of a safety lighting system; adding additional streets to the project; providing for removal of the existing ornamental lighting system; increasing the appropriation therefor from $35,000.00 to $41,000.00; and amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance No. 79565.
